resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Lack of dedicated DBA for Oracle and MySQL migrations.
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Delayed database migrations, potential data loss, and missed deadlines.

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Insufficient expertise for migrating 120TB of structured and 85TB of unstructured data.
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Data migration delays, potential data loss, and increased risk of errors.

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Missing license for automated database migration tools.
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Manual database migration will be time-consuming and error-prone.

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No dedicated DevOps engineer for CI/CD pipeline implementation and automation.
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Slow deployment cycles, increased risk of errors, and manual intervention.

resource_gap_analysis.resource_type: Automated Testing Framework for Cloud Applications
resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Lack of automated testing framework for comprehensive application testing.
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Insufficient testing coverage, increased risk of defects, and delayed releases.

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No dedicated resource for managing change and communication during migration.
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Poor stakeholder communication, resistance to change, and project delays.

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Database Administrator with SQL Server migration experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Addresses database migration expertise gap (Project Requirements 2.2).
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Engage external consultants instead of hiring full-time staff

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Data Migration Specialist with large dataset experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Addresses data migration expertise gap (Project Requirements 1.2).
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Use managed services instead of self-managed infrastructure
Use open-source tools instead of commercial software

resource_recommendations.resource_description: DevOps Engineer with CI/CD pipeline experience
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Leverage existing staff with additional training instead of new hires

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Automated Testing Framework for Cloud Applications
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Implement phased approach instead of parallel migrations

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Change Management Specialist with IT transformation experience
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Utilize cross-functional team members instead of specialized roles

budget_impact_summary.cost_saving_measures: Implement reserved instances for predictable workloads
